entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
